title: Core Requirements
desc: The Music core is designed to provide the concepts and skills students need for successful study in higher level courses. All students in honours program major must complete the following courses:

title: Area of Concentration (General Program)
desc: A minimum of 6.00 Music credits is required, including:

courses: Select at least 1.00 Music credits at the 3000 level or above 1

footnotes: Excluding MUSC*3630 Tragedy, Technology, and Torture: Music  Post 1900

title: Major (Honours Program)
desc: A minimum of 9.00 Music credits is required, including:
Participation in Applied Music courses is strongly recommended for all honours students. Students contemplating graduate studies in Music should consult music faculty early in their program.
Music majors are advised to take MUSC*1180 Musicianship I in Fall Year 1, followed by MUSC*2180 Musicianship II in Winter Year 1.

courses: Select 2.00 additional credits of upper-level topics courses from the following:

title: Minor (Honours Program)
desc: A minimum of 5.00 Music credits is required, including:

courses: Select at least 1.50 Music credits at the 3000 or 4000 level 2

footnotes: Students should be aware that courses at the 3000 or 4000 level may require additional prerequisites.
